body.p: If an entity uses this option and applies the Interpretation prospectively as permitted in paragraph A2(b), the entity does not restate amounts recognised before either the beginning of the reporting period in which the entity first applies the Interpretation (if paragraph A2b(i) is applied) or the beginning of a prior reporting period presented as comparative information in the period in which the entity first applies the Interpretation (if paragraph A2b(ii) is applied).
